COMMUNITY OF HEIRS
(1) Until division, heirs shall manage and dispose of an estate jointly.
(2) When there is no executor of a will and the heirs cannot agree on the management of the estate, the court shall, following a request by any of the heirs, appoint an administrator who shall manage the entire estate or assign a part of the estate to be managed by each heir.
(3) The court may appoint one of the heirs as the administrator of the estate.
(4) The administrator may, with the approval of the court, dispose of all the property in the estate when he or she is entitled to do so by the will or when it is necessary for the payment of expenses or to avert damage.
